original:
The response to various theories of art has been widely regarded as inadequate by some scholars. Critics argue that it either begs the question or relies on an arbitrary distinction between artworks and commentaries on artworks. Many contemporary art theorists contend that aesthetic definitions of art are extensionally inadequate, particularly in light of works created in the style of Marcel Duchamp.


The formalist theory of art posits
